guide.introduction: Sew some pants pocket reflectors to gain visibility for night cycling. They tuck into the pockets for storage and then flip out easily and quickly for riding.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Sew some pants pocket reflectors to gain visibility for night cycling. They tuck into the pockets for storage and then flip out easily and quickly for riding.

Relevant parts
  • Pants with back pockets
  • Fabric
  • Paper or cardboard
  • 3M Scotchlite Plus Retroreflective Vinyl
Tools
  • Pen or pencil
  • Rotary cutter
  • Ruler
  • Scissors
  • Sewing machine

parts.notes: standard letter paper size is fine

lines.text: Create a paper or cardboard template that fits inside your pants' back pocket.
lines.text_raw: Create a paper or cardboard template that fits inside your pants' back pocket.

lines.text: Add 3" at the top for the fold-over flap.
lines.text_raw: Add 3" at the top for the fold-over flap.

lines.text: Cut around your template through two layers of fabric with its right sides together.
lines.text_raw: Cut around your template through two layers of fabric with its right sides together.

lines.text: Stitch around most of the edges, leaving the short flat "top" open.
lines.text_raw: Stitch around most of the edges, leaving the short flat "top" open.

lines.text: Fold over the top of the flap and stitch across both layers twice.
lines.text_raw: Fold over the top of the flap and stitch across both layers twice.

lines.text: Run a zigzag stitch over the raw edge to prevent fraying.
lines.text_raw: Run a zigzag stitch over the raw edge to prevent fraying.

lines.text: Draw your design on the back of the reflective vinyl and cut out the shapes.
lines.text_raw: Draw your design on the back of the reflective vinyl and cut out the shapes.

lines.text: Affix the adhesive-backed vinyl to the fabric flap.
lines.text_raw: Affix the adhesive-backed vinyl to the fabric flap.

lines.text: Tuck the short part of the flap into your back pocket.
lines.text_raw: Tuck the short part of the flap into your back pocket.

lines.text: Secure the flap to the body of the jeans from within the pocket with two safety pins.
lines.text_raw: Secure the flap to the body of the jeans from within the pocket with two safety pins.

lines.text: Wear outside at night while you ride your bike!
lines.text_raw: Wear outside at night while you ride your bike!
